cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))

exm.mng: lit. blue seas where once was mulberry fields (idiom, from 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], Record of the Grand Historian); time brings great changes, life's vicissitudes
same as 渤海[Bo2 Hai3], Bohai Sea between Liaoning and Shandong, Gulf of Zhili or Chihli
Bohai Sea, or Bo Hai, between Liaoning and Shandong, Parhae, Korean kingdom in Manchuria and Siberia 698-926
Bohai Economic Circle (economic region including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Liaoning and Shandong)
